data.name: Samuel Honzek
data.injury: Honzek (upper body) underwent surgery Thursday that is expected to sideline him for up to six months, Pat Steinberg of Sportsnet 960 The Fan reports.

data.name: Martin Pospisil
data.injury: Pospisil (undisclosed) skated on his own Monday, Pat Steinberg of Sportsnet 960 The Fan reports.
